original_text: But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice. Do you expect God to do what you think is right? But you must choose what you will say. I cannot decide for you. So tell us what you are thinking now. But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice. Do you expect God to do what you think is right? But you must choose what you will say. I cannot decide for you. So tell us what you are thinking now. But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice. Do you expect God to do what you think is right? But you must choose what you will say. I cannot decide for you. So tell us what you are thinking now. But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice. Do you expect God to do what you think is right? But you must choose what you will say. I cannot decide for you. So tell us what you are thinking now. But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice. Do you expect God to do what you think is right? But you must choose what you will say. I cannot decide for you. So tell us what you are thinking now. But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice.
korean_text: 하나님께서 그대가 거절한다고 하여 그대의 뜻대로 속전을 치르시겠느냐 그러면 그대가 스스로 택할 것이요 내가 할 것이 아니니 그대는 아는 대로 말하라

sentences.original_text: But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신, 욥이여, 하나님의 정의를 거절합니다.

sentences.original_text: Do you expect God to do what you think is right?
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 하나님이 당신이 옳다고 생각하는 것을 하기를 기대합니까?

sentences.original_text: But you must choose what you will say.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신은 말할 것을 선택해야 합니다.

sentences.original_text: I cannot decide for you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 당신을 위해 결정할 수 없습니다.

sentences.original_text: So tell us what you are thinking now.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러니 지금 당신이 생각하는 것을 우리에게 말해주세요.

sentences.original_text: But you, Job, refuse to accept God's justice.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신, 욥이여, 하나님의 정의를 거절합니다.
